revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The compleat French master : for ladies and gentlemen. Containing I.A new methodical French grammar. ... VIII. A catalogue of the best French books ... By Mr. A. Boy..."
revision.text: Possibly: The compleat French master : for ladies and gentlemen. Containing I.A new methodical French grammar. ... VIII. A catalogue of the best French books ... By Mr. A. Boyer ... (Abel Boyer). (London : Printed for R. Ware, A. Ward, J. and P. Knapton, T. Longman and T. Shewell, R. Hett, C. Hitch, J. Hodges [and 3 others in London], 1744). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/224597685
